hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code needs your attention" with title "Claude Code" sound name "Blow"'

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); path_display=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); is_git_repo() { cd "$1" 2>/dev/null || return 1; [[ -d '.git' ]] || git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; }; get_git_branch() { cd "$1" 2>/dev/null || return 1; git symbolic-ref -q HEAD 2>/dev/null | sed -e 's|^refs/heads/||'; }; path_part=$(printf '\033[34m%s\033[0m' "$path_display"); git_part=""; if is_git_repo "$cwd"; then branch=$(get_git_branch "$cwd"); if [[ -n "$branch" ]]; then git_part=$(printf ' \033[2m(%s)\033[0m' "$branch"); fi; fi; arrow_part=$(printf '\033[35mâ†’\033[0m'); printf '%s%s %s' "$path_part" "$git_part" "$arrow_part"
